mapper.select: SELECT _post.*, count(b.r_id) AS _count FROM ( SELECT a.*, c.m_name, d.bar_name, e.pc_name FROM post a, master c, postbar d, postclass e WHERE d.bar_id = a.bar_id AND d.bar_id = a.bar_id AND e.pc_id = a.pc_id AND c.m_id = a.m_id ) _post LEFT JOIN reply b ON (b.p_id = _post.p_id) WHERE _post.p_time<=#{pTime} GROUP BY _post.p_id ORDER BY _count DESC, _post.p_time DESC
select a.*, c.m_name, d.bar_name, e.pc_name from post a, master c, postbar d, postclass e where d.bar_id=a.bar_id and e.pc_id=a.pc_id and c.m_id=#{mId} and c.m_id=a.m_id order by a.p_time DESC

SELECT a.*,c.pc_name,d.bar_name,e.m_name FROM post a, m_p_collect b, postclass c, postbar d, master e WHERE a.p_id = b.p_id AND a.pc_id = c.pc_id AND a.bar_id = d.bar_id AND e.m_id=a.m_id AND a.m_id=#{mId}

SELECT detail.*, r.r_content, r.m_id AS f_id, m.m_name as f_name FROM ( SELECT a.*, b.m_name, concat(@cur :=@cur + 1) AS rowno FROM ( SELECT p.*, pc.pc_name, pb.bar_name, NULL AS r_id, NULL AS r_ided FROM post p, postclass pc, postbar pb WHERE p.pc_id = pc.pc_id AND p.bar_id = pb.bar_id UNION ALL SELECT r.p_id, NULL AS pc_id, r.m_id, NULL AS p_title, r.r_content AS p_content, r.r_time AS p_time, NULL AS bar_id, 0 AS is_top, NULL AS pc_name, NULL AS bar_name, r.r_id, r.r_ided FROM reply r ) a LEFT JOIN `master` b ON (a.m_id = b.m_id), (SELECT @cur := 0) t WHERE a.p_id = #{pId} ORDER BY a.p_time ) detail LEFT JOIN reply r ON (detail.r_ided = r.r_id) LEFT JOIN `master` m ON (r.m_id = m.m_id)

select a.*, c.m_name,d.pc_name, c.m_img FROM post a, postbar b, `master` c, postclass d where a.bar_id=b.bar_id and a.m_id = c.m_id AND a.pc_id=d.pc_id AND a.bar_id = #{barId} and a.is_top = #{isTop} order by a.p_time desc
